mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (file_code, origin_nm, save_nm, "path", "size", file_extension) SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || 'F' || LPAD((COALESCE(MAX(SUBSTRING(f.file_code FROM '\d+$')::INTEGER), 0) + 1)::TEXT, 5, '0') AS new_file_code, #{originNm}, #{saveNm}, #{path}, #{size}, #{fileExtension} FROM (SELECT file_code FROM file WHERE file_code LIKE TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%') f
